original_title: 21 students granted bail over assault on school teacher
original_body_lines: A total of 21 students who were arrested in connection with the recent assault of a school teacher in Puttalam have been released on conditional bail.

Accordingly, four students who were remanded and 17 students who were arrested yesterday (25 May) for assaulting a teacher at a school in Puttalam were released on conditional bail this afternoon (26 May).
